backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization and storage mixins plus comprehensive resident, medication, physician, and related data types along with comparator utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure containing no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files describing major behaviors, UI patterns, and startup logic.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment checklist for Version 89 detailing pre-deploy verification, deployment steps, smoke tests, and constraints for a publish-only release.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, and shared border and body styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up the root div and loads the frontend's main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application logic handling authentication, actor initialization, startup health checks, routing, and fail-fast timeouts.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component for adding ADL records with required fields, validations, and submission logic using solid white UI styling.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog component for submitting daily vital signs, validating inputs, converting units, and sending data via useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for adding a medication administration record, selecting active medications, validating fields, and submitting via useAddMarRecord.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog to add a new medication for a resident, mapping administration times and physician info before submitting via useAddMedication.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large form dialog to create a new resident with personal info, contacts, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and medications using useAddResident.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for recording a resident's weight entry, converting date to nanoseconds and submitting via useAddWeightEntry.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo with size and mode options, falling back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog component that preloads medication data, lets users edit fields, and submits updates via useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large form dialog for editing all resident details including basic info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and medications, then saving via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form capturing name, role, and employee ID, then saving via useSaveCallerUserProfileStartup.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error and diagnostics screen displaying failure details, backend info, and actions for retrying or logging out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles using both standard and resilient backend actors with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeouts and optional admin initialization, exposing a resilient actor via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides utilities for wrapping promises with timeouts and normalizing backend-related errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds safe asset URLs using Viteâ€™s base path, avoiding double slashes and path issues.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to and from nanoseconds and formatting dates without timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Extracts backend diagnostics and performs a timeout-protected health check against the backend canister.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Centralized configuration for startup-related timeout values used across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main resident management dashboard with filtering, sorting, and admin actions for resident records.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Shows detailed resident information with tabs, editing dialogs, and medication/vitals management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS themes, colors, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and backend issues regarding user profile handling for unregistered users.
